response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to us and its significance to you, we propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This offer is tailored to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 14000}
